member.name: M:de.unika.ipd.grGen.libConsoleAndOS.GuiConsoleControl.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.param: True, wenn verwaltete Ressourcen gelöscht werden sollen; andernfalls False.

member.name: M:de.unika.ipd.grGen.libConsoleAndOS.GuiConsoleControl.InitializeComponent
member.summary: Erforderliche Methode für die Designerunterstützung. Der Inhalt der Methode darf nicht mit dem Code-Editor geändert werden.

member.name: T:de.unika.ipd.grGen.libConsoleAndOS.GuiConsoleControlAsTextWriter
member.summary: A TextWriter implemented by a GuiConsoleControl / a GuiConsoleControl seen as a TextWriter, enriched by the IConsoleOutput interface. Only a subset of the methods is implemented, for one the Write(char) method needed for a minimal implementation, plus the methods directly supported by the wrapped GuiConsoleControl.

member.name: T:de.unika.ipd.grGen.libConsoleAndOS.GuiConsoleControlAsTextReader
member.summary: A TextReader implemented by a GuiConsoleControl / a GuiConsoleControl seen as a TextReader, enriched by the IConsoleInput interface. Only a subset of the methods is implemented, for one the methods needed by the CSharpCC lexer, plus the methods directly supported by the wrapped GuiConsoleControl.
